t: YKONE acquires majority stake in Indian agency Barcode, enhancing global influencer marketing presence - Brand Wagon News | The Financial Express
s: March 21, 2024 - YKONE, an international influencer marketing agency, has acquired 70% of the Indian agency Barcode, specialising in content and influencer marketing. The strategic move aims to capitalise on the growing opportunities in the Indian influencer market, particularly in the luxury sector, which is expected to experience significant growth.
